about_the_game: Experience the inspiring original soundtrack for Tyrants of the Moonsea composed by Mark Braga, Kalen Smith, and Will Musser. All twenty-five tracks are provided in both MP3 (320 kbit) and lossless FLAC format, for your listening pleasure. Total Length: 34 min, 48 sec.
detailed_description: Experience the inspiring original soundtrack for Tyrants of the Moonsea composed by Mark Braga, Kalen Smith, and Will Musser. All twenty-five tracks are provided in both MP3 (320 kbit) and lossless FLAC format, for your listening pleasure. Total Length: 34 min, 48 sec.
